text: This law represents a critical lifeline for distillers across the country, who are in desperate need of economic relief after shutting down their tasting rooms, ending distillery tours, and experiencing significant sales declines from restaurant and bar closures.

Compare/contrast: #MD has commercial #labs testing #coronavirus, #VA is “working on it” @GovHogan closed bars, restaurants, gyms, movie theaters + malls and limiting transit 2day: NO mass closures in #Commonwealth Why? #shutitdown #FlattenTheCurve #CoronaVirusUpdate @VDHgov @VDEM

When history is written it will be found that it was this photo that sparked off the widespread closure of bars and restaurants and crackdowns across USA . #SaintPatricksDay #coronavirus #ShutItDown
Washington, DC, orders restaurant and bar closures to limit coronavirus spread - CNNPolitics
Big news. @GovLarryHogan announces closures of bars, restaurants and more.

I saw the border closures mentioned on the news. Our schools are closed for 4 weeks including Spring Break. Libraries just closed today. Thankfully I picked up a stack of books on Thursday :) Shops and restaurants still open but social distancing is becoming real. Stay safe xx
NEW: CA Gov @GavinNewsom the latest to order statewide closure of bars/ restaurants

IL @GovPritzker orders restaurant/ bar closures. His message: “The time for persuasion & public appeals is over, the time for action is here. This is not a joke. No one is immune to this, and you have an obligation to act in the best interests of all the people of this state.”
Hospitality workers are hardest hit w/restaurant closures, cutbacks. @Hook_Hall has instituted free care kits, free food, free employment counseling for the industry.

.@MainStTakoma Here’s an idea. To help downtown TP business, close the farmers market part of Laurel 7 days a week. Use the space for other purposes, e.g., socially-distanced cafe/restaurant seating and vending. Less traffic with school closures & telework creates opportunities.
So... is $3,000 per-person in stimulus going to pay the bills for all the servers, bar tenders, and chefs being hit by all the restaurant and bar closures? #QEInfinity
Gov Mike Dewine continues to demonstrate what strong crisis leadership looks like. Great job announcing closure of bars and restaurants in Ohio. #coronavirus #COVIDー19 @JoeNBC @chucktodd

President Trump, I just saw a Facebook post from a trucker telling of their plight. No bathrooms or restaurants with the closures. They need your help quickly. We need their services in this critical time. I appreciate all you are doing & your hands on approach.

The @GHillFoundation & @SamuelAdamsBeer have teamed up to provide relief to Massachusetts restaurant workers who have been impacted by the coronavirus closures. Sam Adams donating $100K to kickstart the #RestaurantStrong fund. Donate & learn more https://bit.ly/2w8QpBj #7News

We can support our local restaurants during their three-week closure by having food delivered or ordered through take-out. Let’s keep our restaurants in business while also ensuring we remain safe and healthy!....(4/4)

What’s up with these restaurants asking patrons to come in today/tonight before the official closures? This time is intended for preparation and sanitization. The $$is a necessity for staff but asking for in-person business at this time is dangerous to all.
Day 1: MA just announced restaurant closures till April. Bare with y’all but this is gonna be a slowwwwww ride. No work and just cancelled Australia trip. What now ?

Breaking: Bars, restaurants and clubs in Boston will be required to reduce capacity by 50% and not allow lines to form outside. Closing time right now is set for 11 p.m. Violations of this could result in closure for 30 days. There are exceptions for some take out spots. #wcvb
Ok so @CityOfBoston is calling this a “voluntary closure” for restaurants/bars in #SouthBoston Here’s the list below #7news

I’m joining with others to call on @MassGovernor to order the closure of all schools, daycares, restaurants, bars, and any other establishment that isn’t critical to the preservation of human life. Voluntary social distancing is not working. #ShutDownMASS
Go for a walk. Pop in for a quick bite or a drink and sit a few feet apart. Just gotta be smart about this. Those images are going to force the closure of every bar/ restaurant.

Missouri is still refusing to enforce closures on bars and restaurants, whilst there is someone with all coronavirus symptoms being tested in the county right next to us. My owner refuses to close the dining area. I’m thinking I should just quit my job there

Ohio, Illinois, NYC... I feel for my friends in the restaurant business. These forced closures are going to be devastating. Carry out and delivery won’t make a dent in what they will be losing. I don’t doubt more states and cities will be following suit.

Those Americans buying homes, vehicles, in need of student loans Will be helped. Hopefully this action will help stabilize financial markets. Small business may have to borrow $$$to get through closures of restaurants and so on.

3. #COVID19 March 16 1107hrs. ‘Restaurants, bars and cafes can sell products off premises. State authorities will change rules. Only allowed during this period of closure.’ ‘All park fees are waived.’

Day 3 of #SocialDistance in #NYC: It was beautiful weather—windows open all day. Strayed outside once to pick up lunch to-go. Now heading to bed as news of school & restaurant closures breaks. #COVID19 #coronavirus

this 'suggested voluntary closure' of bars/restaurants is fucking bullshit. Make it mandatory, lots of businesses have clauses in their rent contracts that they don't have to pay rent on the space if they're legally mandated to close. Nothing if they are only pressured to close
Will a decision be made regarding to the closure of NYC bars, restaurants and gyms ?

Dining at a #local restaurant on the UWS is down 80%. If @NYCMayorsOffice doesn’t enact mandatory closures, the insurance won’t kick in. Unfortunately, this is unlikely. I foresee a lot of bankruptcies. #NewYork, support #localbusiness before there are no local businesses.

The reality is that most bars & restaurants in NYC operate on razor thin margins. If the city wants to close them down, there needs to be a serious plan to bail them out BEFORE the shut down. Otherwise this could lead to A LOT of permanent closures and job losses.

If a school closure or other situation is preventing your child from being fed, please count on us and bring them to our restaurants. We will feed them for free.* Locations Include: Athens, College Park, Columbus, Ithaca, Happy Valley, Knoxville, South Bend, and Springfield.

BREAKING: #Ohio Gov. DeWine has announced the closure of all Bars and Restaurants effective 9 pm tonight. (3/15/2020) Carry out and delivery deemed fine at this point. This order is effective indefinitely. #SocialDistancingNow is your duty! Unbelievable times.
Meanwhile, people here fuss about restaurant closures and being asked to stay home watching movies. (Yes, I know, not all. Don't @me.)

if any Capital District pals need help with feeding your pets in light of the bar/restaurant closure, DM me and I’ll buy those soft homies some kibble / whatever you need to get through. plz share / RT / whatever #Albany

Drinking my last beer in @CraftAndDraftSC for a while. Thankfully, I can continue to get takeaway service (and order online) during the statewide on-premise bar and restaurant closures. #drinklocal #shoplocal #WashYourHands – at Craft And Draft
Did this really happen during this crisis? The Health Dpt came in to a fast food restaurant and threatened closure b/c employees were eating in the lobby on their break?
